spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (open living/dining left, kitchen central, bedrooms right, detached garage). However, several plan-accurate details deviate: balcony appears extended/wraps beyond the plan footprint (E5/E2). Core wet-area/utility zone (bath/WC/laundry/robe) is not clearly partitioned to match the 2D arrangement (E2/E1), and multiple interior door positions/orientations are inconsistent or not verifiable from the render (E2/E3). Room proportions look inflated in the living/dining zone relative to the compact central service core shown in plan (E4). Window placements on the bedroom outer wall(s) are partially consistent, but not fully aligned to the 2D plan openings (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (kitchen near living; bedrooms to the right; wet areas near the center). Wall thickness looks generally consistent, but the internal subdivision of laundry/robe/bath/WC does not faithfully replicate the plan (E1/E2). At least one of the small elements (entry linen closet and/or dedicated laundry nook and/or separate WC) appears missing or merged (E1). A major exterior feature (balcony/terrace) is expanded beyond the plan extent (E5/E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Basic furniture zoning is plausible (beds in bedrooms; kitchen cabinetry present). Exact correspondence to the 2D plan (which provides limited furniture detail) is not confirmable, but scale feels generally believable with minor inconsistencies in openness/clearances around the core partitions (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with decent lighting and materials. Camera is isometric-like but still shows perspective (not truly orthographic). Geometry is mostly clean with no major artifacts; composition is clear.

detected_errors.description: Balcony/terrace is hallucinated or extended beyond the 2D plan (plan shows a small balcony only at the top of the lounge; render shows railing/terrace wrapping further).
Entry LINEN closet shown in the 2D plan is not clearly present in the 3D render.
Dedicated laundry nook (L'dry with WM) from the 2D plan is not clearly represented as a distinct space in the 3D render.
Separate WC compartment shown in the 2D plan is not clearly represented as separate from the bath area in the 3D render.
Interior partitioning in the central service core (bath/WC/laundry/robe) does not match the 2D plan layout and boundaries.
Several interior door locations (e.g., to bedrooms/bath/WC) appear shifted or do not match the 2D plan positions.
Some door swing/orientation information from the 2D plan is not respected/visible in the 3D render (doors appear as open portals or differently oriented).
Window placement/count on exterior walls is only partially consistent; at least one opening arrangement differs from the 2D plan.
Proportions appear distorted: living/dining zone reads larger/more open than the relatively compact plan dimensions suggest, while the service core reads simplified.
